metadata.title: CVE-2019-19905 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description: NetHack 3.6.x before 3.6.4 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability whenreading very long lines from configuration files. This affects systems thathave NetHack installed suid/sgid, and shared systems that allow users toupload their own configuration files.

criterions.comment: nethack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
